about-me.headerparagraph: Junior Frontend Developer | Creative solutions for innovative ideas
about-me.firstparagraph: I am an Software Developer with a focus on frontend development from Troisdorf, Germany. My passion is to help designers and companies transform their visions into functional and aesthetic digital experiences. With a strong focus on problem solving, clean code quality and user-centered approaches, I am looking forward to applying my skills in exciting projects as a Junior Frontend Developer. My goal is to create real added value through innovative and performant solutions.
about-me.secondparagraph: Do you think I can strengthen your team? Feel free to contact me - I look forward to creating great things together!
about-me.title: Translation Demo

contact.paragraph: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.thirdcheckbox: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.title: Translation Demo

projects.headertext: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
projects.firstprojecttext: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.secondprojecttext: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
projects.thirdprojecttext: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
projects.title: Translation Demo

references.secondheader: Here what my colleagues said about me
references.firstfeedback: Sinan is a reliable and friendly person. Work in a structured way and write a clear code. I  highly recommend her as a colleague.
